Search by image on Amazon - Chrome Web Store
s: The functionality of the extension is based on the ability to analyze images to search for products. Users can simply right-click on any image in the browser and select "Search on Amazon". The extension then uploads the image to the server, where it is analyzed using a trained neural network.
